result.title: WA on SPOJ "BENEFACT"
result.content:
Hello friends , I am trying to solve this http://www.spoj.com/problems/BENEFACT/ problem on spoj . It just requires to find the diameter of tree . I have solved it using 2 DFS but now I want to solve it using 2 BFS . I have coded it using the same logic just replacing dfs by bfs but I am getting WA . Plz help !

My code : https://ideone.com/hxibYC (bfs1 finds farthest node from any arbitrary node and bfs2 finds farthest distance from the node that bfs1 returned )
